list.name: Releases
list.query: SELECT title, description from annotations WHERE $timeFilter order by time asc
list.rawQuery: select extract(epoch from time) AS time, title as text, description as tags from sannotations where $__timeFilter(time)

panels.description: Current median closing time for recent issues.

targets.rawSql:
select
  descr
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]allm'
order by
  time desc
limit 1

panels.title: Current median time to close for issues created last [[period]] for repository group [[repogroup_name]]

panels.description: Number of closed issues opened recently

targets.rawSql:
select
  time, value
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]alln'
order by
  time desc
limit 1

panels.title: Number of closed issues opened last [[period]] for repository group [[repogroup_name]]

panels.description: Median time to close and number of issues created in [[repogroup]] repository group.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  value as "Average number of issues opened"
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]alln'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Median time to close issue"
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]allm'
order by
  time

panels.title: Number/Median time to close of Issues in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

panels.description: Median time to close and the number​ of issues created in [[repogroup]] repository group.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time as "Time",
  descr as "Median time to close issue"
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]allm'
order by
  time

select
  time as "Time",
  value as "Average number of issues opened"
from
  sissues_age
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'iage[[repogroup]]alln'
order by
  time

panels.title: Number/Median time to close of Issues in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

panels.description: Median time to close and number of issues created in [[repogroup]] repository group.

targets.rawSql:
select
  time,
  value as "The top contribuing company"
from
  sissue_age_company
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'issue_age_company[[repogroup]]istopcontributingcompanym'
order by
  time

select
  time,
  value as "Not top contribuing company"
from
  sissue_age_company
where
  $__timeFilter(time)
  and period = '[[period]]'
  and series = 'issue_age_company[[repogroup]]nottopcontributingcompanym'
order by
  time

panels.title: Number/Median time to close of Issues in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

panels.title: Number/Median time to close of Issues in [[repogroup_name]] repository group ([[period]])

list.name: full_name
list.query: select value_s from gha_vars where name = 'full_name'

list.label: Repository group
list.name: repogroup_name
list.query: select all_repo_group_name from tall_repo_groups order by 1

list.name: repogroup
list.query: select all_repo_group_value from tall_repo_groups where all_repo_group_name = '[[repogroup_name]]'

current.text:
Chaos Mesh issues age dashboard

Links:

  • Metric SQL file.
  • TSDB series definition. Search for issues_age
  • Grafana dashboard JSON.

Description

  • This dashboard shows median time to close issues opened in selected periods and average number of closed issues opened in those periods.
  • Selecting period (for example week) means that dashboard will calculate data for issues opened in those periods.
  • You can select single repository group or summary for all of them.
  • You can select all issues or issues with a specific priority.
  • Issue priority is defined as a label here.
  • See here for more informations about periods.
  • See here for more informations about repository groups.
current.value:
Chaos Mesh issues age dashboard

Links:

  • Metric SQL file.
  • TSDB series definition. Search for issues_age
  • Grafana dashboard JSON.

Description

  • This dashboard shows median time to close issues opened in selected periods and average number of closed issues opened in those periods.
  • Selecting period (for example week) means that dashboard will calculate data for issues opened in those periods.
  • You can select single repository group or summary for all of them.
  • You can select all issues or issues with a specific priority.
  • Issue priority is defined as a label here.
  • See here for more informations about periods.
  • See here for more informations about repository groups.

list.name: docs
list.query: select value_s from gha_vars where name = 'issues_age_docs_html'
